snippet: Bracing for at least one loss on Tuesday, Mitt Romney's campaign made its reservations public with a memo pointing out that no delegates are at stake in the coming primaries and caucuses.
abstract: Bracing for at least one loss on Tuesday, Mitt Romney's campaign made its reservations public with a memo pointing out that no delegates are at stake in the coming primaries and caucuses.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney's campaign, which has been quietly lowering expectations and bracing for at least one loss on Tuesday when voters in Colorado, Minnesota and Missouri head to the polls, made its reservations public Tuesday morning when it released a memo pointing out that no delegates are at stake in the coming primaries and caucuses.

headline.main: Romney Memo Tries to Lower Expectations for Contests
